description:
It is time for the momentous high school event: the school field trip. The Year Two students all travel via bus and bullet train to Kyushu to marvel in the history of the origins of Japanese culture.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Doutes lors du voyage à Tsukushinoshima
Tamerai no Tsukushi no Shima Travelling
Traveling to the Island of Tsukushi... of Hesitation
躊躇[ためら]いの...筑紫島周遊[ツクシノシマ・トラベリング]
